apiKey.label: Mem0 API Key
apiKey.help: API key from app.mem0.ai (or use ${MEM0_API_KEY}). Only needed for platform mode.

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically store conversation context after each agent turn

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories before each agent turn

customInstructions.label: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.placeholder: Only store user preferences and important facts...
customInstructions.help: Natural language rules for what Mem0 should store or exclude (platform mode)

customCategories.label: Custom Categories
customCategories.help: Map of category names to descriptions for memory tagging (platform mode only). Sensible defaults are built in.

customPrompt.label: Custom Prompt (Open-Source)
customPrompt.help: Custom prompt for open-source mode memory extraction.

enableGraph.label: Enable Graph Memory
enableGraph.help: Enable Mem0 graph memory for entity relationships (platform mode only)

searchThreshold.label: Search Threshold
searchThreshold.help: Minimum similarity score for search results (0-1). Default: 0.5

topK.label: Top K Results
topK.help: Maximum number of memories to retrieve

oss.label: Open-Source Configuration
oss.help: Optional. Configure custom embedder, vector store, LLM, or history DB for open-source mode. Has sensible defaults â€” only override what you need.

ignoreCron.label: Ignore Cron Jobs
ignoreCron.help: Skip auto-recall and auto-capture for all cron job sessions

ignoreSessionKeys.label: Ignore Session Keys
ignoreSessionKeys.help: Exact session keys to exclude from automatic memory processing

ignoreSessionKeyPrefixes.label: Ignore Session Key Prefixes
ignoreSessionKeyPrefixes.help: Session key prefixes to exclude. Matched against both the full key and the portion after agent:<id>:

ignoreAgentIds.label: Ignore Agent IDs
ignoreAgentIds.help: Agent IDs to exclude from automatic memory processing

ignorePatterns.label: Ignore Patterns
ignorePatterns.help: Arbitrary strings matched as substrings against session keys. Use for flexible matching of any part of the key.

ignoreHeartbeat.label: Ignore Heartbeat Messages
ignoreHeartbeat.help: Skip auto-recall and auto-capture when user messages start with HEARTBEAT_OK. Enabled by default.

ignoreTrivialMessages.label: Ignore Trivial Messages
ignoreTrivialMessages.help: User messages starting with any of these strings are treated as trivial and skipped during auto-recall and auto-capture.
